sentence.Network_cn: 不知不觉地出现了一些新问题.

sentence.Network_en: Imperceptibly, the boat had slowly turned.
sentence.Network_cn: 船慢慢地在转弯, 简直使人不觉得.

sentence.Network_en: Time fled, and she was surprised to find the year passed imperceptibly.
sentence.Network_cn: 光阴飞逝, 她诧异地发觉一年不知不觉就过去了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... imperceptible 不能感知的 imperceptibly 不可觉地 imperception 无感觉.
新GRE填空题中出现的高频词汇15|GRE词汇 ... impenetrable 费解的， 非常难懂的 imperceptibly 察觉不到地 implement 实施.
无,无字的解释,查字典 ... [villainous] 行为恶劣;品行不好 [imperceptibly] 不知不觉中 [need not;not have to] 不必;用不着.
轻微地的英语翻... ... thinly 1. 淡淡地，微微地，轻轻地 imperceptibly 察觉不出地，细微地，轻微地 breezily 微风地；轻松地，活泼地.

list.abs: 翻译词典... ... imperceptible given 未感知到的材料 Imperceptible changes 细微的变化 An imperceptible change 极细微的变化.
Fred gave his team an almost imperceptible shake of his head ., 佛瑞德给了他的小队一个几乎察觉不到的摇头.
imperative necessary a. 急切的；必要的imperceptibly subtly ad. 不可觉察地；极缓慢地imperceptibly unnoticeably a. 不可察觉的；极缓慢的.
imperative necessary a. 急切的；必要的imperceptibly subtly ad. 不可觉察地；极缓慢地imperceptibly unnoticeably a. 不可察觉的；极缓慢的.
imperceptible 感觉不到的imperceptible given 未感知到的材料imperception 知觉不全

entry.tran: 察觉不出的;感觉不到的;难以察觉的
entry.def: Something that is imperceptible is so small that it is not noticed or cannot be seen.

example.tran: 布赖恩的犹豫几乎难以察觉。

means.word_mean: 1. in an imperceptible manner or to an imperceptible degree;

sentences.sentence: "the power of the Secretary of State in London increased gradually but imperceptibly"

auth_sentence.content: The concerto's opening is notable because the piano enters almost imperceptibly.
auth_sentence.res_content: The concerto's opening is notable because the piano enters almost imperceptibly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The concerto's opening is notable because the piano enters almost imperceptibly.

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, the earth warmed imperceptibly; glaciers plunged into the sea.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile, the earth warmed imperceptibly; glaciers plunged into the sea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile, the earth warmed imperceptibly; glaciers plunged into the sea.

auth_sentence.content: On "You Got Me Up" chimes segue imperceptibly into electronic bleeps.
auth_sentence.res_content: On "You Got Me Up" chimes segue imperceptibly into electronic bleeps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On "You Got Me Up" chimes segue imperceptibly into electronic bleeps.
